properties.description: Represents the properties associated with the goal

hs_created_by_user_id.description: ID of the user who created the goal.

hs_createdate.description: Date and time when the goal was created.

hs_start_datetime.description: Start date and time of the goal period.

hs_end_datetime.description: End date and time of the goal period.

hs_lastmodifieddate.description: Date and time when the goal was last modified.

hs_kpi_value_last_calculated_at.description: Date and time when the KPI value was last calculated.

hs_object_id.description: ID of the object associated with the goal.

hs_target_amount.description: Target amount set for the goal.

properties_hs_created_by_user_id.description: ID of the user who created the goal.

properties_hs_createdate.description: Date and time when the goal was created.

properties_hs_start_datetime.description: Start date and time of the goal period.

properties_hs_end_datetime.description: End date and time of the goal period.

properties_hs_lastmodifieddate.description: Date and time when the goal was last modified.

properties_hs_kpi_value_last_calculated_.description: Date and time when the KPI value was last calculated.

properties_hs_object_id.description: ID of the object associated with the goal.

properties_hs_target_amount.description: Target amount set for the goal.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the goal was created.

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the goal was last updated.

archived.description: Indicates if the goal is archived or not.
